results.content: Craig does a great job of examining a range of topics, building from simple to increasingly complex examples.  He explains not only the how to write code for a given API, but also explains why it's done a certain way.  He also discusses some alternatives and cautions against simple, but potentially dangerous approaches to coding.
results.content_html: Craig does a great job of examining a range of topics, building from simple to increasingly complex examples. He explains not only the how to write code for a given API, but also explains why it's done a certain way. He also discusses some alternatives and cautions against simple, but potentially dangerous approaches to coding.
